attrs.name: format
attrs.desc:
Number formatting configuration item. The following fields can be configured:; {
 fraction: 4, //Retain the number of decimal places. 
 rounding: 0, //Round the number between 0 and 9. For example, if the value is set to 7, the value is rounded off to 6. The default value is 5 (rounded off). If this parameter is set to 0 or greater than 9, truncation is performed. 
 prefix: '$', //Front identifier. 
 groupSize: 3, //Integer part grouping interval, that is, the number of bits of the first grouping. 
 secondaryGroupSize: 2, //Integer part second-level grouping interval. If this parameter is not set or is set to 0, the value of groupSize is automatically used. 
 groupSeparator: ',', //Integer part grouping separator. 
 decimalSeparator:' ', / / Decimal point symbol 
 fractionGroupSize: 0, // Decimal part grouping interval 
 fractionGroupSeparator: '', / / Decimal grouping separator 
 suffix: '@' / / Post identifier 
}

attrs.name: currency
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is CNY.

attrs.name: digits
attrs.desc: Set the number of decimal places. The default value is two.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 2

attrs.name: date
attrs.desc: Set the date box to be displayed in the pop-up box. The value can be of the String or Date() type.

attrs.name: disabled
attrs.desc: Whether to disable the function. The default value is false.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: max-len
attrs.desc: Maximum integer length. The default value is 15 characters.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 15

attrs.name: negative
attrs.desc: Indicates whether the value can be a negative number. The default value is true. The value can be a negative number.

attrs.name: popper-class
attrs.desc: Add a class name for the popper. For details, see the popover component.

attrs.name: popper-append-to-body
attrs.desc: Indicates whether to insert the pop-up box to the body element. When a fault occurs in the dialog box that is displayed, you can set this attribute to false (for details, see the select component).
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: value
attrs.desc: Set the value of the amount component.

attrs.name: rounding
attrs.desc: Controls the rounding of the input amount.

attrs.name: fetchCurrency
attrs.desc: Request service interface of the customized amount component. fetchCurrency returns a Promise object.

attrs.name: fields
attrs.desc: Customized amount component data mapping. This parameter is mandatory when the framework service is not used.

events.name: change
events.desc: This event is triggered when the value of a component changes.
